price: Dan tatkala telah datang kepada mereka kebenaran 701 dari sisi Kami, mereka berkata, "Sesungguhnya ini adalah sihir yang nyata".
arabic: فَلَمَّا جَآءَهُمُ ٱلۡحَقُّ مِنۡ عِندِنَا قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَسِحۡرٞ مُّبِينٞ
footnotes: 701.  Maksudnya, tanda-tanda kekuasaan Allah Subḥānahu wa Ta‘ālā  .

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: falammā jāahumu al-ḥaqu min ʿindinā qālū inna hādhā lasiḥ'run mubīnun
